Lazio has reached an agreement with Real Madrid on the signing of Borja Mayoral. Real Madrid will receive €15M and will be able to match any offer Lazio receives in the future. Mayoral will be earning €2.5M- €2.7M with bonuses per season. @tvdellosport

å’éƒ½æœ‰15m ä½©å“¥

Real Madrid are considering the sale of Reguilón and Ceballos. The club want to make €50M and both are liked by Sevilla and Arsenal respectively. Lunin will return to the club to be Courtois’ number two. [marca]

Takefusa Kubo is the most sought-after player in La Liga. Real Madrid want him to play for a club in a European competition and Sevilla’s option is liked. Betis, Ajax and Osasuna are also pushing hard. Madrid are only contemplating a one year loan. [marca]

Real Madrid would be happy if Ødegaard returns this summer but he wants to play regularly and knows that’s not guaranteed with Modric and Isco on the team. Ødegaard believes that sooner or later he’ll return but wants to be important. [marca]

Real Madrid made €48.5M so far this summer from sales of Achraf (45), De Frutos (5) and Javi Sánchez (3.5). Dani Gómez (5) and Oscar Rodriguez (10) are likely to leave next. Ødegaard, Kubo, Ceballos, Reguilón, Vallejo and Ceballos will be loaned/sold this summer. [marca]

Granada targeting Real Madrid for new arrivals

Granada are pursuing a number of players from Real Madrid as they look to strengthen their squad ahead of next season.

Undeterred, Granada are following another versatile Madrid forward in 21-year-old Brahim Diaz. Once again however there is competition, with Real Betis this time making their interest known, and are understood to be closing in on a loan deal.
